languages.text: "Почему вы сообщаете об этом только сейчас? В десятине Януса есть доля человеческого ресурса — если вы считаете, что Империуму нужны ваши сомнительные "улучшенные" люди, то ошибаетесь".
"Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."
languages.original_text: "Почему вы сообщаете об этом только сейчас? В десятине Януса есть доля человеческого ресурса — если вы считаете, что Империуму нужны ваши сомнительные "улучшенные" люди, то ошибаетесь".

traits.locale_text: "Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium wants your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."
"Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium wants your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."
"Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."
"Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."
"Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."
"Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."

languages.text: “这件事情你为什么拖到现在才报告？加努斯的什一税同样包括生物资源。如果你以为帝国会对你所谓的什么‘改造过的工人’感兴趣，那你就错了。”
languages.original_text: "Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情你为什么拖到现在才报告？加努斯的什一税同样包括生物资源。如果你以为帝国会对你所谓的什么‘改造过的工人’感兴趣，那你就错了。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué no ha informado de esto hasta ahora? El diezmo de Janus incluye gente, y, si cree que el Imperium tiene algún interés en sus supuestos "trabajadores reforzados", se equivoca».
languages.original_text: "Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no ha informado de esto hasta ahora? El diezmo de Janus incluye gente, y, si cree que el Imperium tiene algún interés en sus supuestos "trabajadores reforzados", se equivoca».

languages.text: « Pourquoi avoir attendu pour nous faire part de tout ceci ? La dîme de Janus comporte une part de dîme vivante. Et si vous pensez que l'Imperium est intéressé par vos soi-disant "ouvriers améliorés", vous vous trompez. »
languages.original_text: "Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi avoir attendu pour nous faire part de tout ceci ? La dîme de Janus comporte une part de dîme vivante. Et si vous pensez que l'Imperium est intéressé par vos soi-disant "ouvriers améliorés", vous vous trompez. »

languages.text: 「なぜ今までこれを報告しなかったんだ？ヤヌスの租税には人間も含まれている。もし帝国がお前の言う『改良された労働者』に関心があると思っているなら、それは間違いだ」
languages.original_text: "Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ今までこれを報告しなかったんだ？ヤヌスの租税には人間も含まれている。もし帝国がお前の言う『改良された労働者』に関心があると思っているなら、それは間違いだ」

languages.text: "Bunu bildirmek için neden bu zamana kadar bekledin? Janus aşarına insanlar da dâhildir. İmparatorlu'un senin o sahte 'gelişmiş işçilerini' umursayacağını sanıyorsan yanılıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu bildirmek için neden bu zamana kadar bekledin? Janus aşarına insanlar da dâhildir. İmparatorlu'un, senin o sahte 'gelişmiş işçilerini' umursayacağını sanıyorsan yanılıyorsun."

languages.text: "Warum habt Ihr bis jetzt damit gewartet, das zu melden? Zum Janus-Zehnt gehören auch Personen – solltet Ihr glauben, das Imperium wäre an Euren sogenannten 'verbesserten Arbeitern' interessiert, so irrt Ihr Euch."
languages.original_text: "Why have you waited until now to report this? The Janus tithe includes people — if you think the Imperium has any interest in your so-called 'enhanced workers,' you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: "Warum habt Ihr bis jetzt damit gewartet, das zu melden? Zum Janus-Zehnt gehören auch Personen – solltet Ihr glauben, das Imperium wäre an Euren sogenannten 'verbesserten Arbeitern' interessiert, so irrt Ihr Euch."
